Tables and permanent BBQ are available and the place is very quiet. The river flows quietly and the trees offer a good shade from the morning sun. The road to get there is a bit narrow, steep and nasty: I would not suggest this place for bigger vehicles. I had no problem with my Viano.

title: (32164) - Unnamed Road

Quiet location with toilets and showers (disabled toilet and shower plus female/male). Free electricity. Level and wide squares. night lighting. Open 365 days/24 hours (Call from 10:00 a.m. to 10:00 p.m. to inform that you are going to be in the area).
Hostel 600m away with a menu of the day on request, sandwiches, hamburgers,... at a very good price.

title: (32430) Barral - Camiño do Campo

title: (27460) Sober - Unnamed Road
description: Lookout with views of the canyon. Flat parking suitable for motorhome. Very quiet to sleep. Further down, jetty and kayak. Awesome place. Highly recommended.

Very quiet, it has areas with grass and others with fine sand. A nice bar aprox 400 meters from the place.

title: (27460) Sober - Unnamed Road

title: (27460) O Arroxó - Unnamed Road
description:
A beautiful, very quiet place to meditate.

Nearby is the town of Sande where there is a bar.

title: (32534) - 17 Lugar Toscaña

name: Canon do sil
title: (32749) Canon do sil

name: Solpor Camper Park
title: (27425) Solpor Camper Park
description:
Area in the heart of the Ribeira Sacra with an infinity pool and breathtaking mountain views in an incomparable natural environment, surrounded by natural, cultural and wine tourism resources. Bakery service, possibility to order meals, small shop with local products. Come visit us and discover the Ribeira Sacra by motorhome. 
Reception opening hours: 10:30-14:30 / 16:30-20:30

title: (32136) Oseira -

title: (32416) Ribadavia - 35 Rúa do Xestal

title: (32136) Oseira - 2 Lugar Oseira

You can park a motorhome or two. from the place there are several hiking trails and the oseira monastery that is worth visiting. Google Maps sends you to the park itself, it is the wide area that you can see next to the park. there is room for two cars or three medium camper

title: (27466) Sober - Unnamed Road
description: Very quiet and wooded picnic area with picnic area and barbecues. Areas with sun and shade ideal to spend the day. There is a fountain but no tap.

title: () Parada de Sil - OU-0508
description: Oak Grove in quiet area, next to the very quiet road. We fell asleep listening to the bells of the cows and woke up with the birds singing. Without services but 5 minutes from Parada do Sil.

name: Igrexa de Santa María de Ansemil
title: (32817) Igrexa de Santa María de Ansemil
title_short: (32817) Igrexa de Santa María de Ansemil

title: (32514) Moldes - Unnamed Road
description: Excellent place to spend the night. Very wide and quite flat. There is also a children's play area. It has a fountain, as well as tables and a barbecue. The environment is very beautiful.

title: (32748) Teimende - 10 OU-0604
description: Spring water in the heart of the village very good flow

title: (32740) Parada de Sil - 2 Carretera dos Gozos
title_short: (32740) Parada de Sil - 2 Carretera dos Gozos
description: Recreational area under the shade of oak trees. It has a picnic table, fountain (does not go) and barbecues.

title: (32400) Ribadavia - 12 Camiño da Barca
description:
Free, quiet and shady, perfect to discover this beautiful city of Ribadavia. Services available for free.
Quiet, clean, close to old town.
A big thank's  to the local community! 
Rooftop tent, tables or awning is not allowed. Only auto campers!

title: (32740) Parada de Sil - 6 Camiño do Plantío
title_short: (32740) Parada de Sil - 6 Camiño do Plantío
description: New municipal parking in Parada de Sil, very large, about 40 seats and three buses. Close to Pepe parking.

title: (32740) Parada de Sil - 1 Campa Feira da
title_short: (32740) Parada de Sil - 1 Campa Feira da
description: 1 robinet

title: (32740) Parada de Sil - 1 Campo da Feira
title_short: (32740) Parada de Sil - 1 Campo da Feira
description: We spent one night in the parking lot of Sil at the town hall. At the town hall, there are water sources. Calm. We recommend going through the bakery at the entrance to the village...

title: (32400) Ribadavia - 15 Rúa José María Martínez Vázquez
title_short: (32400) Ribadavia - 15 Rúa José María Martínez Vázquez
description: Self-service laundry from 8 to 24 h. everyday

title: (32400) Ribadavia - 17 Lugar Ribadavia
description: Nice place at the mouth of the Avia river. There are a couple of tables with stone benches and good views for a picnic. Quiet and friendly.

title: (27466) Sober - Lugar de Vilaescura
description: Quiet spot in woods by a lake. Silent and lonely. More practical for campers than for AC.

title: (32812) Pegariña - 38 Aldea Pegariña
description: Parking on the mountain basically prepared for large vehicles to turn around since there is no place on the road and for cars that go to the cemetery to park, large and shady, it has a fountain at the entrance of the cemetery

title: (32400) Ribadavia - 41 Estrada de Francelos
description: Self-service laundry, A laundry. very economical and clean. Parking in front. Bar / Taperia next door. payment in cash or by card.

title: (32514) Igrexario - 18 OU-0414
description: Recreation area near the village, very quiet, there is a swing for the children, tables and bins, the river is there if you want to take a bath, and nearby there are a lot of roads and places to visit .

title: (32740) Parada de Sil - 8I Camiño da Aira
title_short: (32740) Parada de Sil - 8I Camiño da Aira
description: Paved and level esplanade next to a soccer field. ideal place to start routes through the Sil canyons. Space for many motorhomes. Very calm.

title: (32417) A Arnoia - 7 Lugar Outeiro Cruz
description: Parking area next to the Arnoia river and with stone tables and an old mill. There are no services or water or emptying area. Very nice river walk. It is next to the town.

title: (27422) Sober -
description: One of the most beautiful points of view, that of Santiorxo, in Doade. Surrounded by pines, with some benches that overlook the canyons of the river Sil and the vineyards.

title: (32514) Boborás - 27 Lugar Penedo
description: Old train station, all the parking is flat, the old train stations are abandoned, there is no service

title: (32211) Gomesende - 3 Lugar O Val
description: Nice place next to the Sanctuary of Our Lady of the Valley through which the route of the Arnoia river passes pr-g143, I am going to take it as a starting point arriving by a track to escudeiros and start the route from there, accessible for motorhomes of 7.5m.

title: (32655) Rairiz de Veiga - Estrada de Xinzo
title_short: (32655) Rairiz de Veiga - Estrada de Xinzo
description: Big place with tables, benches and drinking water... Drive-in is possible without any problems. Located on a normal traffic road

title: (27460) Sober - 18 Avenida Outeiro
description: Zona de aparcamiento asfaltada para varios vehículos pero en pendiente. Área de picnic pegada a la piscina municipal de Sober. Tiene 3 mesas de picnic, mucha sombra, parque infantil y pista de fútbol/baloncesto. La piscina está remodelándose y por ahora sin acceso.

title: (32417) Arnoia - 23 Acceso Vila Termal
description: Hotel Arnoia Spa Parking. At the start there are several sockets where you can plug in the motorhomes. (12 outlets) 8/10 places beware of tree branches that can get in the way

title: (32418) Ourense - 75 Lugar Francelos
description: Picnic area with possibility of parking. Next to the river, very quiet to spend the night

title: (32813) A Pía - Unnamed Road
description: Very nice viewpoint with picnic tables and a relatively flat space for parking. It's a super quiet place on the top of a hill, with the forest underneath. We had a super quiet night here, completely alone, just listening the sound of the owls. Totally recommended for a chill night. Good access for all cars. The place is also very clean, although there aren't any trash bins. Please don't leave trash.

title: (27438) Ferreira de Pantón -
description: Shady space in front of the wake, next to a small forest.

title: (27438) Ferreira de Pantón - 17 Rúa Escairón
description: Good parking next to the soccer field, there is space for 4 vans or cars. You have to find the balance. Very quiet area. No services.

title: (32748) Verengo - RIBEIRA SACRA
description: Drinking water source. Garbage bins next to it.

title: (32748) A Edrada -
description: Excellent place to spend the night and spend the day meters from the river. AC not suitable, only vans since the road (barely 15 meters) is very narrow and not in very good condition. Access is right where the "Bon Voyage" sign is.

title: () Sober - Unnamed Road
description: Impressive place in the middle of nature, total tranquility, and also with a taperia that is eaten very well and with wines from its own winery and from the area, also speaking with the owner who is a very friendly person, gives electricity and Water

title: (32747) Parada de Sil - Unnamed Road
description: Great spot in the heart of nature, on the edge of the sacred river with a view of the vineyards on the hillside. We were alone, almost flat ground, peaceful night, access road accessible to vans without pb.

title: (32748) Parada de Sil - Unnamed Road
description: 180 ° viewpoint with sunset and spectacular views

title: (27438) Ferreira de Pantón - 89 Rúa Ourense
description: Repsol petrol station which has a drinking water tap. The manager is a very nice man with whom we had a good laugh.

title: (32428) Leiro - OU-0306
description: Very quiet place next to the cemetery with picnic tables and a fountain, sun and shade. Climbing area nearby.

title: (32417) A Arnoia - Unnamed Road
description:
This car park is located in a dead end, at the end of a path where there is a cemetery.
There is a garbage can outside the cemetery.
Quiet place in the middle of erasure.
Nearby there are the natural terma of Prexigueuro

Camiño do cementerio, Prexigueiro, 32410 Ribadavia, Province of Ourense, Spain

title: (27515) Chantada - 5 LU-P-1801
description: Iglesia Santa María de Nogueira, Chantada.Lugo Religious paintings somewhat transgressive. It is believed that they were made by artists inspired by the Sistine Chapel. Interesting. Very good for Antonio who acts as a guide on the visit. The road is complicated from Chantada, but we did it with a 7.5 m AC. When you get to the church there is an esplanade.

title: (32418) Prexigueiro - 79 Lugar Prexigueiro
description: drinking fountain. Near spa and pools. You can buy homemade wine in several houses.

title: (32710) Ribadavia -
description: Termas de prexigueiro, on the river, quiet place

title: (32418) - 105 Lugar Prexigueiro
description: Parking near the hot springs of Prexigueiro. The hot spring car park closes when they are closed. The car park that is referenced now is right next to the path that goes down into the free zone to bathe with thermal water. On the side of the road, you can park about three vehicles.

title: (32433) Faramontaos -
description: Parking at a crossroads with little traffic. Right at the starting point for hikes. no service We stood here one night with no problems. The entrance is a bit narrow, but we managed to get through the two stones with a Peugeot Boxer L2H2.

title: (27440) Sober - 17D Rúa da Ponte
description: Large car park with around twenty spaces near the main road and a small village. calm and no worries with the neighborhood

title: (32748) Castiñeiras - Unnamed Road
description: Pleasant place with a van but access is good for cars, vans etc... very quiet, cement tables and benches in the shade. nice place where you can swim quietly ..

title: (32747) Parada de Sil -
description: Source of water of the mount.

title: (32748) Forcas - 30 Lugar Forcas
description: Day and night parking area, very quiet town. No services. Parking area for routes.

title: (27423) Sober - Unnamed Road
description: Outside area of a secondary road little traveled. Next to a viewpoint overlooking the river Sil. Practically flat. If you get the night is a good alternative. Warehouse area very interesting.

title: (32650) Vilar de Santos - 11 Aldea Barrio
description: Area with tables and a seat, a bit close to the road but wide enough to make a quiet stop and park next to the town

title: (32411) - 5 Lugar Cruceiro Gordo
description: Water in service station. Possibility of connecting a hose.

title: (27548) Cuñas - LU-P-5819
description: This is the lower shaded car park at Praia da Coba. It's next to the beach and restaurant busy by day  but quiet at night. It is on the road but few cars pass after closing hours. Discretion required if staying overnight. Beautiful swimming spot with beach. Neither the access road (very steep and narrow) nor the parking places (large car size and closely spaced) are suitable for large motorhomes. We did it in a VW T6.

title: (32235) Pontedeva - 17 Lugar Xinzo
description: Beautiful countryside around the town chapel. There are tables and beautiful views. At 5 minutes, below the town, there is a route along the bank of the river Deva.

title: (27548) Cuñas - 58 Lugar Lama
description: Good place to park, and even to spend the night, maximum 3 motorhomes. Nice views at night on weekends and summer time, at 100 MTS in Labidegas it has afther hours. quiet place

name: Bodega Val da Lenda
title: (27423) Bodega Val da Lenda
description: Family winery Val Da Lenda in the heart of the Ribeira Sacra. It is allowed to stay overnight at the farm to visit the cellar or buy its rich wines and pomace. No Services. Natural environment close to tourist attractions (monasteries, viewpoints, Ribeira Sacra train ride, cities, etc.). Exceptional reception. Victor, the owner, surprises with his approachability and genuine friendliness. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.

title: (32410) Melón - Carretera Logroño-Vigo
description: Recreation area with swimming pools for swimming and a path where you can enjoy beautiful waterfalls

title: (32748) Parada de Sil - OU-0605
description: Parking at the edge of the road, but very quiet almost without cars at night, next to the Mao river walkways. It is not very big, but useful because there are not many alternatives. Only 2-3 places. Below is a hostel with more room, but access is steep.

title: (32200) Cortegada - 22 Rúa Baño do Monte
description: Fantastic place to spend the night close to the Spa-Spa of Cortegada, 100 meters away. Park adjacent to the pool, with public barbecues and public and free hot springs. Drinkable water in public fountain.

title: (32748) Parada de Sil - OU-0605
description: Parking of the Fabrica da Luz Hostel, very quiet, better to arrive at the last minute when the hikers have left and have a space. The area is beautiful right next to the Mao River and access to the walkways that go to the mouth of the Sil.

title: (32200) Cortegada - 20 Rúa Otero Novas
description: Parking located at the foot of the river Miño, right next to the old spa of Cortegada, idyllic setting.Cafetería -terraza in the spa.There are a couple of hairpin bends but it passes well, it is worth it for the beauty of the place.

title: (27518) Chantada - 50D Estrada do Seixo
description: drinking water fountain. Access by vehicle is possible up to a few meters away. Therefore only suitable for canisters.

title: (32748) Parada de Sil - OU-0605
description: Small car park next to the road with views of the Mao River, ideal if there is no room in the closest car parks to visit the walkways, it is very flat and you can spend the night. There is room for three well parked motorhomes.

title: (27500) Chantada - 80 Carretera o Seixo
description: Three level parking spaces at a park with river, sports stadium, playground and toilet. Bakers and restaurants / bars / coffees 10min walk away (along the river).

title: () Pontedeva - Carretera Trado-Armean
description: Large brand new free area, all services free, barbecue, picnic tables, beautiful panorama, but no shade. In addition, prohibitions of all kinds: no wedges, no blinds, no table, no armchair, etc...

title: (27519) Chantada - Avenida dos Pilos
description: Parking very good for a night not far from the city center. When I went for the feria it was perfect.

title: (36490) Varóns -
description: Quiet place next to the river, with two esplanades to park

title: (36491) Crecente - PO-400
description: Very quiet parking to rest. Well located to visit the hot springs of Prexigueiro.Source with drinking water.

title: (32410) Melón - 2 Camiño dos Fundios
description: Parking in front of the Melon monastery

title: (27500) Chantada - 42D Avenida de Lugo
description: Parking very close to the urban center. Although the terrain has some slope, there are flatter areas in which you can park the camper.

title: (32750) Montederramo - OU-0602
description: Large, flat place, at the water's edge, accessible for any vehicle, games for children, toilets in the small buildings, barbecue on site with picnic tables, great place to spend a day plus a night quietly in the heart of nature

title: (27512) - Unnamed Road
description: Parking with capacity for about 12 vehicles, unbeatable views, very quiet

title: (32636) Xinzo de Limia - Pista de Morgade
title_short: (32636) Xinzo de Limia - Pista de Morgade
description: Service station with gray discharge (very small chest) and black (perfect). The water has a padlock. I guess you have to ask at the gas station for the key. Reporting I guess it will be free. Very large esplanade, truck parking

title: (27512) - Unnamed Road
description: Parking near a viewpoint, very quiet place, great views

title: (36490) Crecente - PO-406
description: Miradoiro Alto Guillade. Parking area for 2-3 motorhomes.

title: (32539) Espiñeiros -
description: Rest area en route. Lots of shade and mountain views. Too bad people leave all the papers on the floor.

title: (32849) Bande - OU-540
description: Small parking spot with water source. Possibility to have picknick.
